Articles.Content:
Hi.

I'm trying to uninstall KSP and can't figure out how.

The program does not appear in Add/Remove programmes.

And now I'm out of ideas. I'm sure its very simple and I'm just being a bit thick but can anyone help me?

Version 0.23.0.395

Running on Windows but not through Steam

Thanks

Hello Chew_It, to uninstall KSP simply delete it's folder.

KSP does not install like other games, you could even run it straight from an external drive just by having all the game files in there.

So what is inside KSP folder is everything you have about the game, excluding it will completely remove it from your computer.

Ah OK.

Never like just deleting things but thanks I'll do that now.

Cheers
